name: lapis-orkestra-assets
description: Custom Bootstrap theme for Lapis Orkestra

scripts.build-css: npm run build-admin-css && npm run build-public-css
scripts.copy-bootstrap-js: mkdir -p public/assets/default/shared && mkdir -p public/assets/default/shared/js && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js public/assets/default/shared/js/
scripts.copy-icons-fonts: cp -r node_modules/bootstrap-icons/font/fonts public/assets/default/admin/css/fonts && cp -r node_modules/bootstrap-icons/font/fonts public/assets/default/public/css/fonts
scripts.postinstall: npm run copy-bootstrap-js && npm run copy-icons-fonts
